import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Nav, Navbar, NavDropdown, Form, FormControl, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import * as categoryService from '../../services/categoryService' const Header = () => { let [categories, setCategories] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { categoryService.getForNavigation() .then(res => setCategories(res)); }, []) let categoryItems = categories.map((category) =>
  • {category.name}
    • ) return (
    Evetrgreen
    • Shop
    • Categories
        { categoryItems }
    • User
        { categoryItems }
    ) } export default Header;
